Address.Address1: Cankurtaran Mahallesi Ishakpasa Caddesi. Kutlugun Sok No: 1 Sultanahment

Description.Text:
Location
This hotel is located in the tourist centre of Istanbul just a short walk from shopping and entertainment venues. There is a stop for public transport to be found in the hotel's vicinity lying approximately 200 m from the hotel.
Facilities
The hotel is housed in a historical Ottoman building that dates back to 1905 and that was lovingly restored in 1995 and equipped with every 21st century luxury imaginable. There are a total of 17 rooms of which 10 are doubles, 6 are singles and 1 is a suite. Facilities on offer include a foyer with a 24-hour reception desk, a lift, a safe and a currency exchange facility. An air-conditioned à la carte restaurant with highchairs for infants is also to be found within the hotel and a public Internet terminal, room and laundry services are on offer. Car parking facilities are available.
Rooms
The well-equipped rooms come with a bathroom with hairdryer, a direct dial telephone, satellite TV, a minibar and central heating.
Sports/Entertainment
Various sports and entertainment options are on offer from local providers in Istanbul.
Meals
Guests may select their breakfast from an ample buffet. Lunch and dinner may be taken à la carte.
Payment
Diners Club, MasterCard and VISA are accepted as methods of payment.
